actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to require the presentation of full military honors at the burial of veterans.

summary.text: Requires the presentation of full military honors at the burial of veterans upon the request of the next-of-kin of the deceased, if such deceased will be buried within a radius of fifty miles of a military installation or post. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1489)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to require the presentation of full military honors at the burial of veterans.
